'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|landmass]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A large, desert island housing the remnants of a splinter [[Engwith]]an civilization. The [[Poko Kohara ruins]] have remained open for exploration for a long while, but the devastating storms and local wildlife have made exploration difficult. At least one expedition from [[VTC]] was lost recently, trying to ascertain the potential for mining luminous adra at the Island.

==Locations==
* [[File:Icon Poko Kohara Ruins.png|x50px|left]] '''[[Poko Kohara ruins]]''': An old Engwithan ruin, and the central location on the island.<br clear="left" />
;Points of interest
* [[File:Icon Huana Shrine.png|x50px|left]] '''[[Kābara Reku Shrine]]''': A small shrine dedicated to [[Berath|Rikuhu]]. You can identify its dedication with [[Religion]] and determine that the area is safe to rest  with [[Survival]] (giving you a free rest). A Monk, Cipher, or Druid can ... . You can also rest, pray at the shrine and rest, or do the unspeakable and desecrate it.<br clear="left" />
* [[File:Icon Shipwreck.png|x50px|left]] '''Shipwreck''': In the ocean to the east of the landing point.<br clear="left" />
* [[File:Icon Flotsam.png|x50px|left]] '''Flotsam''': One to the northeast of the shipwreck, and another just south of it.<br clear="left" />
